takeaways: It’s weeks of noise, interruptions, and expectations I didn’t agree to
Christmas is not one day for me
This is how I get through it without burning out
For a long time, I told myself I’d “cope better this year”
Christmas breaks my routine, overloads my senses, and reactivates old stuff I thought I’d dealt with
source_title: How I survive Christmas as a neurodivergent adult
